thread.title: Free bag of compost from Homebase
thread.title_full: Free bag of compost from Homebase - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Free bag of compost from Homebase
text: The Telegraph has teamed up with Homebase to offer readers a free 50-litre bag of Miracle-Gro All Purpose Compost, worth £4. This is ideal to use for all your planting needs from beds and borders to pots and containers and is enriched with Miracle-Gro Plant Food, which feeds plants for 3 months. Plus, you can also save £5 when you spend £20 or more on garden products at Homebase. Choose from outdoor furniture, quality garden tools, beautiful garden plants and pots, and essential maintenance items such as hoses and plant food. How to Claim: See the newspaper on Sunday, August 2, 2015 @telegraph
